rdf:Description.dc:description: Some issues have title: Water supply outlook update.
Published as a supplement and update to: Water supply outlook and snow survey bulletin.
Merged with: Water supply outlook for Southern and Central Alberta, ISSN 0837-208X; and, Spring runoff outlook, ISSN 1184-2776; to become: Water supply outlook for Alberta, ISSN 0848-4066.
